.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples_crack_egg.py:


=============================
Crack Egg
=============================

This an example of how to crack an egg (take a slice of subjects/lists from it)

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 10-24

.. code-block:: Python


    # Code source: Contextual Dynamics Laboratory
    # License: MIT

    #import
    import quail

    #load data
    egg = quail.load('example')

    #crack egg
    cracked_egg = egg.crack(subjects=[0], lists=[0])

    cracked_egg.info()
